lyrics:
7 contributorswhite unicorn lyricsverse 1
and have you been to the carnival
i would like to see you
and theres a whole lot of people there
who would like to be you
and with the white unicorn
across her shoulder
makes you think that she might have been
someone whos older yeah

chorus
i know its on your mind
weve been drinking on the wine
that we drank from the serpents vine
now we live in another time

refrain
we could live together
we could live together

verse 2
she lives on the borderline
that they call hazel
and the tent that she lives in
it has the name of her lover yeah
see wolfmother liveget tickets as low as 60you might also likechorus
i know its on your mind
and weve been drinking on the wine
that we drank from the serpents vine
now we live in another time

bridge
sister can you tell me when the day turns to night
she left without a word and wondered inside
how many days must i still wonder why
and see her face in every passerby

refrain
we could live together
we could live together

instrumental break

chorus
and i know its on your mind
weve been drinking on the wine
that we drank from the serpents vine
now we live in another time

refrain
we could live together
we could live together
we could live together4embed
